TemporalDirections.TEXT: ,Character,Dialogue,EpisodeNo,SEID,Season 52700,NEWMAN,(Pondering Kramer's plan out loud) They do have an intimate knowledge of the street..,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52701,KRAMER,They're always walkin' around the city. Why not just strap something to them?!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52702,JERRY,"(Sarcastic) Now, that's the first sensible idea I've heard all day.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52703,[Setting,The Coffee shop],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52704,LEO,"Jerry, hello! (Sits down)",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52705,JERRY,"So, Leo, how's everything? You doin' Okay?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52706,LEO,I still have the ringing in the ears. Sounds like the phone.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52707,JERRY,"(Shrugging his problems off) Yeah, yeah. But what about money? Are you strapped? Do you need a little?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52708,LEO,"What, are you kidding? I should you loaning you money! (Quickly amending what he just said) But I'm not.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52709,JERRY,"(Being frank) Leo, I saw you in Brentano's yesterday.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52710,LEO,Why didn't ya say hello?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52711,JERRY,Because you were too busy stealing a book.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52712,LEO,(Giving a courtesy lesson) You still say hello.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52713,JERRY,"(Showing that it's a problem) Leo, I saw you steal.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52714,LEO,"Oh, they don't care. We all do it.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52715,JERRY,"Who, criminals?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52716,LEO,Senior citizens. No big deal.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52717,JERRY,You could get arrested.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52718,LEO,Arrested? Come on! (Goes into a routine explaination for his stealing) I'm an old man. I'm confused! I thought I paid for it. What's my name? Will you take me home?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52719,JERRY,(Pleading) Leo..,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52720,LEO,"Alright, alright. Mr. Goody Two-Shoes. You made your point.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52721,JERRY,(Thinking he's stopped Leo's thefts) Thank you.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52722,LEO,(Yelling out to every one in the coffee shop) Will somebody answer that damn phone?!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52723,[Setting,Peterman office building hallway],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52724,ELAINE,"(Talking to a co-worker) Of course Zach and I have been dating. What'd you think, I was the office skank?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52725,WALTER,Well..,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52726,ELAINE,"""Well""? We've been dating for three months. Between you and me, and.. anyone else you want to tell.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52727,ELAINE,"(Exits, closing the door behind her) Oh man. Ugh..",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52728,WALTER,(Pointing at the closed door) Isn't that Zach?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52729,ELAINE,Yeah.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52730,WALTER,Aren't you upset?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52731,ELAINE,"(Starts to fake cry) Yes. Oh, man! Oh!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52732,[Setting,NYC street],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52733,KRAMER,"Alright, listen up. Now, you three have been hand-picked out of possibly dozens that applied. Now, what we're looking for are motivated, hard-working, homeless gentlemen like yourselves to pull rickshaws. (One of the homeless men starts to wander off, walking away) Now, I don't caer where you're from, or how you got here, or what happened to your homes. But you will have to be physically fit.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52734,HOMELESS MAN,The government!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52735,KRAMER,(Continuing as if nothing happened) Because to pull rickshaws means more than just strong legs. You're also going to need a well-toned upper body.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52736,NEWMAN,"Alright, who's first?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52737,KRMAER,Hey.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52738,NEWMAN,"Name, please.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52739,HOMELESS MAN,Rusty.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52740,NEWMAN,(Writing on a clipboard) Rusty.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52741,KRAMER,"(To Rusty) You know, I once knew a horse named Rusty. No offence.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52742,NEWMAN,"(To Rusty) Alright, uh, take it down to the end of the block. Make a controlled turn, and bring her back. Let's see what you've got! Ok? Ready, and go!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52743,KRAMER,(Watching Rusty's pulling of the rickshaw) Giddy up! Good form.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52744,NEWMAN,"(Yelling out to Rusty) Alright, pace yourself, 'Cause you're gonna have to do this all day for very little money.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52745,KRAMER,"Hey, what's he doin'?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52746,NEWMAN,I think he stealing our rickshaw!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52747,KRAMER,"Well, then, he's out!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52748,HOMELESS MAN 2,"(Salutes Kramer) I'll take the job. Potato salad!""",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52749,[Setting,Bookstore],17.0,S09E17,9.0

DIRECTION.text: Quickly amending what he just said
Goes into a routine explaination for his stealing
Yelling out to every one in the coffee shop
Exits, closing the door behind her
One of the homeless men starts to wander off, walking away
Watching Rusty's pulling of the rickshaw
